alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties in the Florida Big Bend through 745 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Steinhatchee, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Steinhatchee, Tennille, Howell Place, Jonesboro, Clara and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor
